data.title: Behrman Capital sells Waterline Renewal Technologies to Azuria Water Solutions, a New Mountain Capital Company.
data.description: On February 26, 2026, Behrman Capital, a private equity firm located in New York, revealed the sale of Waterline Renewal Technologies to Azuria Water Solutions. This transaction signifies a significant milestone for Behrman, showcasing their successful exit strategy. The specific financial details of the deal, including the purchase price and any associated figures, were not disclosed to the public. Behrman's decision to sell Waterline aligns with its investment objectives and is expected to have a notable impact on both companies involved.

data.title: Agile Consulting Group receives U.S. Patent for real-time Nexus Study Interface design. ATLANTA, Feb. 26, 2026 /PRNewswire.
data.description: Today, in Atlanta, Agile Consulting Group, specialists in sales tax exemption and compliance, revealed that they have been awarded a U.S. Design Patent by the United States Patent and Trademark Office for their display screen and graphical user interface. This patent recognizes the unique design of their interface, which is utilized in their services. This achievement marks a significant milestone for the company in the realm of intellectual property protection.

data.title: Vertiv partners with Hut 8 to streamline AI deployment using OneCore system, enhancing efficiency and scalability.
data.description: COLUMBUS, Ohio - On February 26, 2026, Vertiv (NYSE: VRT) introduced its Vertiv™ OneCore factory-integrated infrastructure, designed to streamline deployment processes and enhance schedule predictability. This innovative system aims to combat construction limitations by simplifying on-site implementation. As a prominent player in critical digital solutions, Vertiv continues to prioritize efficiency and reliability in its offerings.

data.title: European Union funds SK-IIDT-Vaxxas consortium for high-density microarray patch vaccines to enhance seasonal & pandemic flu protection.
data.description: Consortium comprising SK, IDT, and Vaxxas introduced a high-density microarray patch (HD-MAP) for vaccines in Europe, aiming to enhance vaccine efficacy and availability. They are focused on developing HD-MAP vaccines with high immunogenicity for both seasonal and pandemic influenza. The initiative is set to address pressing immunization challenges by capitalizing on innovative technology.

data.title: Lifetime Brands will release its fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results followed by a conference call.
data.description: Lifetime Brands has disclosed the upcoming release date for its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2025. The company will be hosting a conference call to discuss these results. The earnings report is anticipated to be published on [insert date], followed by the conference call at [insert time]. Shareholders and interested parties are encouraged to tune in to learn more about the company's performance during this period.

data.title: Pet grooming franchise Sparkle Grooming Co. exceeds 500 licenses in less than 2 years, with 7% attrition and 73% conversion in 2025.
data.description: A pet care franchise driven by membership has achieved 500 awarded licenses in 27 states. In 2025, they experienced a 7% annual member attrition rate but achieved a high 73% membership conversion rate. The franchise, Sparkle Grooming Co., based in Scottsdale, Arizona, crossed this milestone on February 26, 2026.

data.title: Ollie’s Bargain Outlet Holdings, Inc. to report Q4 and FY 2025 earnings on March 12, 2026, with a conference call at 8:30 am ET.
data.description: In Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, on Feb. 26, 2026, Ollie’s Bargain Outlet Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: OLLI) revealed plans to disclose its financial performance for Q4 and fiscal year 2025 before the market opens on March 12, 2026. The President and CEO, Eric van der Valk, along with the Executive VP and CFO, Robert Helm, will lead a conference call at 8:30 a.m. ET on the same day to review the results and address inquiries from investors.

data.title: ScrubaDub opens new car wash in Medford, MA, their first location in the area, at 2 Fulbright Street.
data.description: A well-established car wash company in New England, ScrubaDub, which has been operating since 1966, has recently opened a new branch in Medford, located at 2 Fulbright Street near Mystic Ave. This new site signifies ScrubaDub's initial venture into serving the Medford community.

data.title: ImageneBio (Nasdaq: IMA) to attend Leerink Global Healthcare Conference in Miami from March 8-11 for meetings and chat.
data.description: On February 26, 2026, ImageneBio, Inc. (Nasdaq: IMA) revealed plans for its involvement in the 2026 Leerink Global Healthcare Conference in Miami, Florida from March 8-11. The company will engage in a fireside chat and conduct individual meetings during the event.

data.title: Whitehawk Therapeutics (Nasdaq: WHWK) will present at investor conferences as a clinical-stage oncology company.
data.description: On February 26, 2026, in Morristown, New Jersey, Whitehawk Therapeutics, Inc. (Nasdaq: WHWK), a company in the clinical-stage oncology therapeutics field, announced their focus on utilizing advanced technologies to enhance antibody drug conjugate (ADC) cancer treatments. This company is dedicated to applying these technologies to established tumor biology with the goal of efficiently delivering improved ADC cancer treatments.

data.title: H+H International A/S reports preliminary 2025 results and outlook for 2026. CEO Brinkmann optimistic about future.
data.description: In a recent company announcement from Copenhagen, Denmark, H+H International A/S (H+H) revealed preliminary, unaudited financial results for the entirety of 2025 along with a financial outlook for the upcoming year 2026. The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Jörg Brinkmann stated, "Market...".

data.title: Dow Jones Futures up, Nvidia in buy zone post strong earnings. S&P500 above 50-day line. ($ numbers not provided)
data.description: Stock market futures showed indecision as Nvidia remained in a strong buy zone following impressive earnings and guidance. The S&P 500 bounced back above its 50-day moving average. Dow Jones futures are on the rise amid this positive momentum in the market.

data.title: Ethereum Foundation outlines 7-fork plan for 2029 with focus on speed, privacy, security, and scalability improvements.
data.description: The strategic plan aims to achieve quicker finality, enhanced privacy features, advanced protection against quantum threats, and significantly higher throughput capacity through upcoming upgrades.

data.title: BioVigil's hand hygiene monitoring lowered HAIs by 46.95% for healthcare organizations, maintaining this decrease annually.
data.description: In Ann Arbor, Michigan, recent data collected from multiple clients revealed that healthcare organizations utilizing BioVigil have successfully decreased healthcare-associated infections (HAIs) by an average of 46.95%. These improvements have been consistent and maintained throughout different years. The majority of partners...

data.title: Gentoo Media secures EUR 18 million shareholder loan facility for refinancing process to optimize capital structure.
data.description: In Birkirkara, Malta, on February 26, 2026, Gentoo Media disclosed that its top shareholders have granted a dedicated loan facility of EUR 18 million to the Company. This move is aimed at improving the Group's capital structure and bolstering financial adaptability.

data.title: Codere Online posts record net gaming revenue of €224.1 million and Adj. EBITDA of €13.8 million for FY 2025.
data.description: The Company achieved impressive results, generating a record net gaming revenue of €224.1 million and posting an Adjusted EBITDA of €13.8 million for the fiscal year 2025.

data.title: Matador Resources offers $500 million cash to buy back 6.875% Senior Notes Due 2028, using $750 million New Notes for funding.
data.description: In Dallas, Matador Resources Company (NYSE: MTDR) has started a cash tender offer called the “Tender Offer” to buy up to $500 million worth of its 6.875% senior notes due 2028 (the “2028 Notes”). This move is being funded by a portion of the net proceeds from their recent private placement of $750 million in senior unsecured notes due 2034 (the “New Notes”). The company aimed to use the funds from the New Notes offering to repurchase outstanding 2028 Notes, marking a significant financial strategy shift.

data.title: Matador Resources plans $750 million senior notes offering due 2034, to repurchase $500 million 2028 notes.
data.description: Matador Resources Company (NYSE: MTDR) has disclosed its plan to offer $750 million of senior unsecured notes due 2034, subject to market conditions. The offering will be carried out as a private placement to eligible buyers. The company aims to utilize the net proceeds from this offering to repurchase all $500 million of its outstanding 6.875% senior notes due 2028. This repayment will be executed through a cash tender offer.

Israel's COGAT: 'Two mobile clinics by the Latin Patriarchate of Jerusalem have entered the Gaza Strip today. The clinics are composed of four separate containers, fully equipped with medical devices and essential medications designed to bolster the medical response in Gaza.

data.title: Cronos Group Q4 earnings missed estimates by -100%, EPS at $0.0 vs. $0.02. Revenue up by $14.23 million.
data.description: Cronos Group (NASDAQ: CRON) disclosed its Q4 earnings on February 26, 2026, at 07:35 AM. The key points from the release include missing estimated earnings by -100.0%, with an EPS of $0.0 compared to the anticipated $0.02. The revenue saw an increase of $14.23 million from the equivalent period last year. In the preceding quarter, the company exceeded expectations. For further details, the complete article can be found on Benzinga.com.
